villageHall.name: Village Hall
villageHall.description: The Village Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 500 gold per day.

townHall.name: Town Hall
townHall.description: The Town Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 1000 gold per day.

cityHall.name: City Hall
cityHall.description: The City Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 2000 gold per day.

capitol.name: Capitol
capitol.description: The Capitol earns your kingdom 4000 gold per day.

fort.name: Fort
fort.description: The Fort provides your town with defensive walls.

citadel.name: Citadel
citadel.description: Including a 50% increase to base creature growth, the Citadel adds a keep, and other terrain obstacles, to a town's defenses.

castle.name: Castle
castle.description: The Castle adds two arrow towers, fortifies your town's defenses, and doubles base creature growth.

tavern.name: Tavern
tavern.description: The Tavern increases morale for troops defending the city.

blacksmith.name: Blacksmith
blacksmith.description: The Blacksmith provides your armies with Ballistas.

marketplace.name: Marketplace
marketplace.description: With the Marketplace, you can buy and sell resources (exchange rates increase with each Marketplace you own).

resourceSilo.name: Resource Silo
resourceSilo.description: The Resource Silo provides you with an additional +1 sulfur each day.

special1.name: Artifact Merchants
special1.description: For a nominal fee, you can purchase artifacts from the Artifact Merchants.

special2.name: Mana Vortex
special2.description: The Mana Vortex temporarily doubles spell points for any garrison or visiting hero.

special3.name: Portal of Summoning
special3.description: With the Portal of Summoning, you can recruit creatures from an externally flagged dwelling.

special4.name: Battle Scholar Academy
special4.description: The Academy of Battle Scholars teaches new skills to any hero (+1000 experience) once.

horde1.name: Mushroom Rings
horde1.description: The Mushroom Rings increase Troglodyte production by 7 per week.

horde1Upgr.name: Mushroom Rings
horde1Upgr.description: The Mushroom Rings increase Infernal Troglodyte production by 7 per week.

grail.name: Guardian of Earth
grail.description: The presence of the Guardian of Earth increases weekly creature generation by 50%, provides your empire with an additional 5000 gold each day, and increases the Power of a garrison hero by +12 when defending against a siege.

mageGuild1.name: Mage Guild Level 1
mageGuild1.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.

mageGuild2.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.

mageGuild5.name: Mage Guild Level 5
mageGuild5.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.

dwellingLvl1.description: The Warren allows you to recruit Troglodytes.

dwellingLvl2.name: Harpy Loft
dwellingLvl2.description: The Harpy Loft allows you to recruit Harpies.

dwellingLvl3.name: Pillar of Eyes
dwellingLvl3.description: The Pillar of Eyes allows you to recruit Beholders.

dwellingLvl4.name: Chapel of Stilled Voices
dwellingLvl4.description: The Chapel of Stilled Voices allows you to recruit Medusas.

dwellingLvl5.name: Labyrinth
dwellingLvl5.description: The Labyrinth allows you to recruit Minotaurs.

dwellingLvl6.name: Manticore Lair
dwellingLvl6.description: The Manticore Lair allows you to recruit Manticores.

dwellingLvl7.name: Dragon Cave
dwellingLvl7.description: The Dragon Cave allows you to recruit Red Dragons.

dwellingUpLvl1.name: Upg. Warren
dwellingUpLvl1.description: The Warren allows you to recruit Infernal Troglodytes.

dwellingUpLvl2.name: Upg. Harpy Loft
dwellingUpLvl2.description: The Harpy Loft allows you to recruit Harpy Hags.

dwellingUpLvl3.name: Upg. Pillar of Eyes
dwellingUpLvl3.description: The Pillar of Eyes allows you to recruit Evil Eyes.

dwellingUpLvl4.name: Upg. Stilled Voices
dwellingUpLvl4.description: The Chapel of Stilled Voices allows you to recruit Medusa Queens.

dwellingUpLvl5.name: Upg. Labyrinth
dwellingUpLvl5.description: The Labyrinth allows you to recruit Minotaur Kings.

dwellingUpLvl6.name: Upg. Manticore Lair
dwellingUpLvl6.description: The Manticore Lair allows you to recruit Scorpicores.

dwellingUpLvl7.name: Upg. Dragon Cave
